channel.title: Could not find the main class: client. Program will now exit
channel.description:
I just finished jarring and signing my client (working on my webclient). But when i try to open up the client.jar that I made, I get this error:
Could not find the main class: client. Program will now exit.
Does anyone know what this means?
Thanks

item.title: Could not find the main class: client. Program will now exit
item.dc:creator: @D_R_O_P_Y00 D R O P Y00
item.description:
@D_R_O_P_Y00 wrote:

I set it as “client” (but without the quotes). is that correct?

Read full topic
